EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.0 - Email blast
EmailTemplate.subject: You can’t see the future, but you can be ready for it
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Be ready for the future Prepare for it. Be ready for IoT and 5G Nokia AirScale Radio Access is being specified by more and more operators as a future-proof investment that offers almost unlimited scalability, ultra-low latency and extreme connectivity.
What’s your priority?
- Future-proof your radio network <[[https://networks.nokia.com/airscale/a-future-network]]> - Go beyond gigabit speeds <[[https://networks.nokia.com/airscale/beyond-gigabit]]> - Target zero emissions <[[https://networks.nokia.com/airscale/target-zero-emissions]]> Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
